verses.text: Now these \add are\add* the words of the letter that Jeremiah the prophet sent from Jerusalem unto the residue of the elders which were carried away captives , and to the priests , and to the prophets , and to all the people whom Nebuchadnezzar had carried away captive from Jerusalem to Babylon ;

( After that Jeconiah the king , and the queen , and the eunuchs , the princes of Judah and Jerusalem , and the carpenters , and the smiths , were departed from Jerusalem ;)\f + \fr 29.2 \ft eunuchs: or, chamberlains\f*
By the hand of Elasah the son of Shaphan , and Gemariah the son of Hilkiah , (whom Zedekiah king of Judah sent unto Babylon to Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon ) saying ,
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel , unto all that are carried away captives , whom I have caused to be carried away from Jerusalem unto Babylon ;
Build ye houses , and dwell \add in them;\add* and plant gardens , and eat the fruit of them;

Take ye wives , and beget sons and daughters ; and take wives for your sons , and give your daughters to husbands , that they may bear sons and daughters ; that ye may be increased there, and not diminished.
And seek the peace of the city whither I have caused you to be carried away captives , and pray unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for it: for in the peace thereof shall ye have peace. \p

¶ For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel ; Let not your prophets and your diviners , that \add be\add* in the midst of you, deceive you, neither hearken to your dreams which ye cause to be dreamed.
For they prophesy falsely unto you in my name : I have not sent them, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 29.9 \ft falsely: Heb. in a lie\f* \p

¶ For thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, That after seventy years be accomplished at Babylon I will visit you, and perform my good word toward you, in causing you to return to this place.

For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thoughts of peace , and not of evil , to give you an expected end.\f + \fr 29.11 \ft expected…: Heb. end and expectation\f*
Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you.
And ye shall seek me, and find \add me\add*, when ye shall search for me with all your heart.

And I will be found of you, saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and I will turn away your captivity , and I will gather you from all the nations , and from all the places whither I have driven you, saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and I will bring you again into the place whence I caused you to be carried away captive. \p
¶ Because ye have said , The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath raised us up prophets in Babylon ;

\add Know\add* that thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of the king that sitteth upon the throne of David , and of all the people that dwelleth in this city , \add and\add* of your brethren that are not gone forth with you into captivity ;

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; Behold, I will send upon them the sword , the famine , and the pestilence , and will make them like vile figs , that cannot be eaten , they are so evil.

And I will persecute them with the sword , with the famine , and with the pestilence , and will deliver them to be removed to all the kingdoms of the earth , to be a curse , and an astonishment , and an hissing , and a reproach , among all the nations whither I have driven them:\f + \fr 29.18 \ft to be a curse: Heb. for a curse\f*

Because they have not hearkened to my words , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, which I sent unto them by my servants the prophets , rising up early and sending \add them;\add* but ye would not hear , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. \p
¶ Hear ye therefore the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, all ye of the captivity , whom I have sent from Jerusalem to Babylon :

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel , of Ahab the son of Kolaiah , and of Zedekiah the son of Maaseiah , which prophesy a lie unto you in my name ; Behold, I will deliver them into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon ; and he shall slay them before your eyes ;

And of them shall be taken up a curse by all the captivity of Judah which \add are\add* in Babylon , saying , The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* make thee like Zedekiah and like Ahab , whom the king of Babylon roasted in the fire ;

Because they have committed villany in Israel , and have committed adultery with their neighbours’ wives , and have spoken lying words in my name , which I have not commanded them; even I know , and \add am\add* a witness , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ \add Thus\add* shalt thou also speak to Shemaiah the Nehelamite , saying ,\f + \fr 29.24 \ft Nehelamite: or, dreamer\f*

Thus speaketh the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts , the God of Israel , saying , Because thou hast sent letters in thy name unto all the people that \add are\add* at Jerusalem , and to Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah the priest , and to all the priests , saying ,

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath made thee priest in the stead of Jehoiada the priest , that ye should be officers in the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, for every man \add that is\add* mad , and maketh himself a prophet , that thou shouldest put him in prison , and in the stocks.
Now therefore why hast thou not reproved Jeremiah of Anathoth , which maketh himself a prophet to you?
For therefore he sent unto us \add in\add* Babylon , saying , This \add captivity is\add* long : build ye houses , and dwell \add in them;\add* and plant gardens , and eat the fruit of them.
And Zephaniah the priest read this letter in the ears of Jeremiah the prophet. \p
¶ Then came the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto Jeremiah , saying ,

Send to all them of the captivity , saying , Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* concerning Shemaiah the Nehelamite ; Because that Shemaiah hath prophesied unto you, and I sent him not, and he caused you to trust in a lie :

Therefore thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; Behold, I will punish Shemaiah the Nehelamite , and his seed : he shall not have a man to dwell among this people ; neither shall he behold the good that I will do for my people , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; because he hath taught rebellion against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 29.32  t rebellion: Heb. revolt *
